relevant_findings.general: Well-appearing man in NAD, sleeping soundly but easily arousable. Very pleasant and interactive.
relevant_findings.HEENT: NC/AT, PERRL, EOMI, sclerae anicteric, MMM, OP clear
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, no thyromegaly, no JVD, no carotid bruits
relevant_findings.lungs: CTAB, no r/rh/wh, good air movement, resp unlabored, no accessory muscle use
relevant_findings.heart: PMI non-displaced, bradycardic with regularly irregular rhythm, no MRG, nl S1-S2
relevant_findings.abdomen: Normoactive BS all 4 quadrants, soft/ND, TTP in epigastric region on R-side but no rebound/guarding and tolerates deep palpation well, no masses or HSM
relevant_findings.extremities: WWP, no c/c/e, 2+ peripheral pulses (radials, DPs)
relevant_findings.neuro: Grossly intact, focal exam not performed
